Actions to Take When the POA Code Cannot Be Found
Locate the POA using the
Office of General Counsel (OGC) Accreditation Search
.
If the POA was ...
Then ...
found
use POA code 099
add a VBMS note explaining the situation and actions taken, and
follow the procedure in
M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, 2.C.3
to have the POA added to the corporate database.
not found
add a VBMS note explaining why the POA could not be updated, and
forward the information to the Agent and Attorney Fee Coordinator (AAFC) for follow-up with the POA.  No further action is required.
Reference
:
For more information on the AAFC’s responsibilities in handling non-accredited POA submissions, see
M21-5, Chapter 8, Section A
.
